posts.body: Get a better VPN, retard.

>>17f22a9d-8c86-440d-a727-262dcc4af749
Neat, seems to work really well for now.
What about more advanced features like a thread watcher and other things that 4chan X has? Is that possible? Thanks for your work dude.

>>6ca36252-976f-4907-907c-f49f3f821e5b
Also, why do ID's show as the posting name? We should have an option to be anonymous, like the chans were intended.

>>146983f4-bbd1-4526-86b2-6132ad2e5114
Thats retarded reasoning, you don't need a public ID to do that.
08chan should have its server everywhere and nowhere at the same time.

>>7afdf2db-169d-4dd9-923a-7f492048bfef
RIP to the chan then, there is no point if everyone is a forced namefag.
I see no reason why ID's couldn't be visually hidden from the site while still functioning as they are supposed to.

>>bbfb1020-9bd2-4406-a5d0-9166f4afdb77
Thats not the point, retard.
It should be hidden for everyone as default and regular users shouldn't be able to see it by a simple CSS edit.

>>ee8a8123-3b4c-4f4d-a183-9521ada73c1e
There should be no clearnet site, only one explaining how to get to the zeronet one.

And it should be hosted by Epik, they seem to be only ones to support free speech.

>>3f258b8e-f20b-48d3-a5b8-9187ff2682ba
>There is already an option to hide for everyone by default but regular users can still see the IDs with a simple JS edit.
Thanks for repeating what i just said.
>Also, I'm not sure why you think pretending we're all anonymous would be any better than being transparent about the fact that there is correlation between posts and the IDs people are using.
What the fuck are you talking about? Go to voat if thats what you want, you are completely missing the whole point of what a chan is.

>>ee66161d-d954-4a59-8450-e59631e2c3bf
>9.What Are 8ch’s Future Plans?If8ch comes back online, it will be done when 8ch develops additional tools to counter illegal content under United States law. If8ch returns, staff would implement a way to restrict certain parts of the website during a state of emergency, in which case any board in question would be put in a read-only mode until it would be deemed safe enough to enable posting again.It also looks forward to working with the federal government to improve the law, making reporting and engagement with law enforcement agencies easier. Toward this end, 8ch includes its list of suggested legislative reforms as Exhibit B.
